text:
Applications for Apply HN closed a few hours ago. Now we need a way to sift through the threads and give the community a final say.

A few users have suggested that we create a list of applications that had the most interest, then run a poll to let the community produce a final ranking. That seems reasonable, so we can tentatively consider that the default plan, depending on what other ideas appear in this thread.

Unfortunately I have to be offline most of today, but I'll read and respond to the comments here tonight.
title: Tell HN: Apply HN applications now closed, let's discuss the next step

text:
Throwaway account for this one.. We're a team of 2 and have tremendous growth since we've been founded last year and we always wanted to be part of YC for a couple of specific reasons than just the funding or mentorship.

We're currently partnered with a big YC company and they've specifically requested us to not pursue VC money or apply to YC. I think the reason is when the time is right, they would want to acquire us at a very low price.

Since this is a YC company, would applying be a conflict of interest and we'd be just wasting our time or even worse.. cut ties on our trusted partnership?
title: Ask HN: Should we still apply to YC even after told not to?
